==== Create a new Tactic Page ====
* Go to [[Tactics.WebHome]] and click "Create" * Choose the Tactic Template * Make up a name for the tactic * Click "Create" * You should now be looking at your new page. Dont worry that it doesnt look right yet.
==== Add Objects to your page ====
* You are now going to add a single TacticClass object to your page: * Under the Edit menu, choose "Objects".
===== Add a "Tactic Class" object =====
* In the "new object:" field, choose "Tactic Class" and click "Add". * Now fill in the fields with information about the tactic: ** name: the same as the title ** description: typically something like "When an author ..." ** example: a typical or contrived example. ** category: a general category that the tactic falls into. If the category you want doesn't exist yet, create it, press Save, then refresh this page, and it should appear in the list of available categories. * Press "Save". Open this page in another tab to view it, so you don't have to keep going in and out of "edit mode". Every time you press "Save", go to the other tab and refresh the page. * At this point, verify that the full page looks correct.
